intro_text: The patrol is instructed to check out the cliffs farther up the mountain for any signs of falling rocks or crashing snow that could cause trouble in camp.
decline_text: The way up is too difficult to travel today.

success_outcomes.text: The group ascends the mountainside, carefully, until they reach the border. They work together to move any potentially dangerous rocks away from the edge and measure the snowfall to report back to camp. Things seem safe for the moment.

After finally making it up the treacherous trail, p_l notes a particularly large rock that's too close to the edge. The patrol spends the day laboring in the snow, pushing the rock with all their might, and eventually moves it a safer distance away. Every cat is a bit sore, but proud of c_n's collective strength!

After finally making it up the treacherous trail, p_l notes a particularly large rock that's too close to the edge. s_c is quick to volunteer {PRONOUN/s_c/poss/} strength and takes charge of moving the freezing boulder. The snowfall makes the task difficult but nothing seems to stop s_c! Full of pride, {PRONOUN/s_c/subject} {VERB/s_c/manage/manages} to move the rock to a safer location and isn't even that sore... for now.

After finally making it up the treacherous trail, p_l notes a particularly large rock that's too close to the edge. s_c is quick to volunteer {PRONOUN/s_c/poss/} wits and works out a way to slide the rock over packed down snow. Under s_c's direction the patrol finishes up quickly and briskly heads back to camp with good news and cold paws.

fail_outcomes.text: The patrol tries to head up the cliff side trail but it's no use. The freezing wind is howling and the snow is biting deep into every cat's paws. p_l calls the patrol off and the cats return to camp.

history_text.scar: m_c was scarred by the freezing cold winds on the cliff side trail.
history_text.reg_death: This cat eventually succumbed to the freezing cold during a cliff side patrol.
history_text.lead_death: {VERB/m_c/were/was} frozen on a cliff side patrol

fail_outcomes.text: Taken by surprise, the patrol scatters and loses cohesion. The rogues are quick to take advantage of the confusion and eventually the patrol retreats, r_c badly wounded.

fail_outcomes.text: The rogues posture and jeer, eventually provoking a battle. They prove to be strong fighters and eventually the patrol is forced to retreat, r_c badly injured.
